sentences.sContent: Strong support for the war has unified the nation.
sentences.sCn: 对战争的坚决支持使这个国家团结了起来。

sentences.sContent: His music unifies traditional and modern themes.
sentences.sCn: 他的音乐结合了传统和现代的主题。

words.tran: 统一；使一致（unify的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: if you unify two or more parts or things, or if they unify, they are combined to make a single unit
